CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 3, 1941, pg. 16, reads: "Harry Bobo, local heavyweight fistic sensation, has the distinction of having 'crowned' many fighters in ring, but he never had the pleasure before of crowning such a beauty as Miss Ruth Sharpe, pictured above, who won the title of the Queen for the Center Avenue 'Y's' Activities Week program last week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Harry Bobo crowning Ruth Sharpe (Barnett) under arch with stars and flag in Centre Avenue YMCA gymnasium
CatSubject_tab: Crowns--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Gymnasiums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Flags--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Young Men's Christian Association (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Bobo, Harry.Sharpe, Ruth.
